title: College admissions scandal: Ex-USC water polo coach found guilty of taking bribes, test taker gets prison - Fox News
content:
1. College admissions scandal: Ex-USC water polo coach found guilty of taking bribes, test taker gets prison  Fox News
  2. Jovan Vavic in Varsity Blues Scandal Is Found Guilty  The New York Times
  3. Former USC water polo coach Jovan Vavic convicted in admissions scandal  CBS Los Angeles
  4. Ex-USC water polo coach guilty in college admissions case  Los Angeles Times
  5. Former USC Water Polo Coach Jovan Vavic Found Guilty In Varsity Blues Scandal  TMZ
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: A former decorated University of Southern California water polo coach was found guilty Friday of taking hundreds of thousands of dollars in bribes to recruit unqualified students so they could attend the elite institution and a test taker whose role was central to the college admissions scandal was sentenced to four months in prison.
